amendment.description: To prevent identity theft by allowing the sharing of social security data among government agencies for immigration enforcement purposes.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 169 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 169 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Allard to Amendment SA 100. (consideration: CR S1180-1182; text: CR S1180-1181) To prevent identity theft by allowing the sharing of social security data among government agencies for immigration enforcement purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 169 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Allard to Amendment SA 100.
